send.services.charts.test: { type: 'line', position: model.constants.chart.position, size: model.constants.chart.size, data: tools.generateChartData(model.userValue, model.networkValues, services.time) }

doInParallel.doc: Just to place children under it

childByName.body:
var childIndex = GE.indexOf(children, value);
return childIndex != -1 ? [childIndex] : [];

cyclicInterpolate.body: return fraction < 0.5 ? tools.interpolateVector(start, end, fraction / 0.5) : tools.interpolateVector(end, start, (fraction - 0.5) / 0.5);
